title: Transgender News Report - February 15, 2026
summary: Top transgender news stories from February 11-15, 2026

stories.headline: Trans icon Ts Madison granted restraining order against content creator
stories.summary: Ts Madison, a prominent trans icon, received a restraining order against a content creator.

stories.headline: California sues Trump administration to protect privacy of trans students
stories.summary: California filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration to defend transgender students' privacy rights.

stories.headline: Trans women can use women's toilets, except at work, high court rules
stories.summary: UK High Court ruling: trans women can use women's toilets in public, but restricted in workplace settings.

stories.headline: Top Democrats re-introduce trans bill of rights
stories.summary: Congressional Democrats have reintroduced the Transgender Bill of Rights to codify protections for transgender Americans.

stories.headline: Trans-led organization FLUX celebrates a decade of service
stories.summary: FLUX celebrated its tenth anniversary of providing transformative services to TGI communities.

stories.headline: Trans students not included in new India University Grants Commission equity rules
stories.summary: India's UGC released new equity rules that exclude transgender students from protections.
